name: stETH is the reserve currency of the internet?
description: I want to talk about stETH as the reserve currency of the internet. I am going to use the analogy that stETH will serve as the backbone of defi and eth settlement in the same way the treasury market does. I have plenty of images and analogies. Also, I will talk about how ETH staking percentages are going to be far higher than people expect and I may include examples of how eigenlayer will play a part in it.

speakers.name: Luke Besser
speakers.bio: I am co-founder and Manager of Cosimo Capital, a liquid token fund.
